titleStmt.title: Coach and sedan, pleasantly disputing for place and precedence the brewers-cart being moderator.
titleStmt.author: Peacham, Henry, 1576?-1643?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Raworth, for Iohn Crowch; and are to be sold by Edmund Paxton, dwelling at Pauls chayne, neere Doctors-Commons,

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed: Mis-Amaxius, i.e. Henry Peacham.
Running title reads: A pleasant dispute between coach and sedan.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
